title: 6/30 Windows Update Prevents Login
body: Just wanted to share in case anyone else comes across a similar issue. I updated my build of Windows last night/this morning. After punching my creds into the launcher, I got the "unable to login, check the servers or troubleshoot" spiel. I went thru the recommended troubleshooting steps from the provided link, then also a support thread called "Troubleshooting connection" or something like that. No dice. The only way I was able to fix this was rolling back to the previous build of windows 10. You can do that in the windows update window.

replies.body:
Weeeeeiiiiiiird! I haven't seen any other notices of the latest Windows 10 update messing things up, but I'm glad you were able to get your issue fixed up and I'll be keeping this in mind for others!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
